column1: #Text=On Sunday , Wikinews interviewed creator of memorial site LisaMcPherson.org , former Lisa McPherson Trust employee and long time Scientology critic Jeff Jacobsen .
#Text=LisaMcPherson.org is a memorial site created in 1997 containing information on her death and the resulting legal case against the Church of Scientology .
#Text=died in 1995 while in the care of the Church of Scientology .
#Text=After a car accident , she became mentally unstable .
#Text=Scientologists removed her from the hospital and placed her in the Introspection Rundown , she died 17 days later while still in care of the Church .
#Text=She was used as an icon during Project Chanology , the protest of the Church of Scientology by Anonymous .
#Text=Protesters were pictured with signs that said " Remember Lisa McPherson " and " Ask Scientology Why Lisa McPherson Died " , other protesters had posters with her picture on it .
#Text=: Give a short description of yourself and what you do outside of protesting Scientology .
#Text=: I 'm a Political Science senior at Arizona State right now .
#Text=I 'm 52 , from South Dakota Was in a cult age 16-22 ( not Scientology ) .
#Text=Got a BA in Religious Studies in 1984 .
#Text=Worked at Lisa McPherson Trust until it closed .
#Text=: What was your job at the trust ?
#Text=So I helped the people " downstairs " when they needed documents or whatever .
#Text=I see from your website that you list your " cult experience " as your once belonging to the United Pentecostal Church .

column1: #Text=Do you consider all organized religions as " cults " ?
#Text=: No. Not all religions are cults .
#Text=The word is loaded but I think still useful .
#Text=A cult is totalitarian , has an us vs. them mentality , and thinks they are the sole keepers of The Truth And uses deception , takes advantage of members .
#Text=How do you finance your activities in this area ?
#Text=: What happened to Bob Minton , your former chief financial supporter ?
#Text=: That 's a sore point for many , but I 'll give my version .
#Text=I think he was n't prepared for the backlash he 'd get from Scientology .

#Text=So finally he caved into the pressure that Scientology is so good at applying , and to get out from under them he agreed to certain things , he changed his testimony in court to be helpful to the church , he stopped all anti-scientology activity and he has left the scene .
#Text=: How powerful is the Church of Scientology in your opinion ?
#Text=: Their power now comes from their money .
#Text=I do n't believe they have much recruiting ability , nor that many members ( maybe 100,000 worldwide . ) Also their ruthlessness gives them power .
#Text=But I do believe they are on the decline .
